title: Mystery Island (New Episode)
overview: London Police psychiatrist Dr. Emilia Priestly needs to take a relaxing break from her stressful job, so her wealthy friend invites her to Mystery Island, an immersive murder-mystery-themed resort hosting a special retreat for the original investors. As the mystery game begins, tragedy strikes when the resort's reclusive founder is murdered. Emilia "partners" with local detective Jason Trent to investigate.Â
